original_title: Le Tour De France The Official History 1993 - 2005
overview: This official history celebrates an incredible century of cycling from the early flickering images of the 1903 winner, Maurice Garin, to the amazing scenes which greeted Lance Armstrong's fifth straight victory in 1993.  Introduced by Sean Kelly and narrated by David Duffield this is a programme for all cycling fans to savour.
tagline: The official history of the Tour De France
title: Le Tour De France The Official History 1993 - 2005
